help-file.title: SKILL_ROGUE
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills available to the Rogue class:
SKILLS --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h piercing, 1h slashing, appraise, awareness, backstab, bandage, blindfighting, carve, circle, climb, disarm, dodge, double attack, dual wield, first aid, fishing, hide, mine, mount, pick lock, ranged weapons, retreat, safe fall, sneak, swim, track, unarmed damage 10th level: appraise 20th level: parry, subterfuge 30th level: disguise 31st level: switch opponents 51st level: trap
Rogue Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Assassin, Bravo, Thief
